chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))

Premises:
pX : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
pluspf = fun l1 l2 : list (Term A n) => projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (l1, l2)) (snd (l1, l2)) a) (plusp (l1, l2)) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) Arguments pluspf (_ _)%list_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
ltT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
eqP : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
ltP_refl_pX : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
plusP_inv1 : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
plusP_inv3b : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) (pluspf p q)
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
plusP_inv2 : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a b -> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)
canonical_pX_eqT : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)
eqp_inv3l : forall (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
eqp_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
eqp_inv3r : forall (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqP A eqA n p q
canonical_skip_fst : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l)
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
plusP_inv3a : forall (a b : Term A n) (p q s : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s -> s = pluspf p q

```coq
intros a b p q.
destruct (ltT_dec (A:=A) ltM b a) as [lt|not_lt].
- apply plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q) in H; auto.
  rewrite H. apply eqp_refl_pX; auto.
- destruct (eqT_dec (A:=A) (n:=n) a b) as [eq|not_eq].
  + apply plusP_inv3b with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q) in H; auto.
    rewrite H. apply eqp_refl_pX; auto.
  + apply canonical_pX_eqT with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) in H; auto.
    destruct (zeroP_dec A0 eqA (n:=n) b) as [zero_b|not_zero_b].
    * apply nzeroP_multTerm with (a:=a) (b:=b) in not_zero_b; auto.
      destruct not_zero_b as [not_zero_a|not_zero_b]; auto.
    * apply eqp_imp_canonical with (p:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) (q:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) in H; auto.
      apply canonical_skip_fst with (l:=p) (a:=b) (b:=a); auto.
Qed.

original: intros a b p q. destruct (ltT_dec (A:=A) ltM b a) as [lt|not_lt]. - apply plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q) in H; auto. rewrite H. apply eqp_refl_pX; auto. - destruct (eqT_dec (A:=A) (n:=n) a b) as [eq|not_eq]. + apply plusP_inv3b with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q) in H; auto. rewrite H. apply eqp_refl_pX; auto. + apply canonical_pX_eqT with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) in H; auto. destruct (zeroP_dec A0 eqA (n:=n) b) as [zero_b|not_zero_b]. * apply nzeroP_multTerm with (a:=a) (b:=b) in not_zero_b; auto. destruct not_zero_b as [not_zero_a|not_zero_b]; auto. * apply eqp_imp_canonical with (p:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) (q:=pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) in H; auto. apply canonical_skip_fst with (l:=p) (a:=b) (b:=a); auto.
